s.text: My purpose in writing to you is twofold.
To help accomplish these goals we need your support.
Consequently, the MHA Alumni Association has become the strongest alumni group in the SPEA family.
First, to inform you of some recent activities of the SPEA MHA Alumni Association and second, to ask for your commitment, both financial and participatory.
